page.title: 01 Introduction
page.content: Our square contains the River Stour which takes up about a third of the square. The main place is {Mistley}which is a small village and there are about 3,500 people living there. The main {industries}are the quay and the maltings .Mistley quay is an old quay and it has been there for hundreds of years. Mistley is famous for its swans which eat grain from the{maltings.} The rest of our square contains farmland. There are about 5 farms and the crops they grow are wheat, barley and rape. Some of the farms keep a few beef cattle. There is one railway linked to Colchester and London.
